ftpClient.secure: Use secure FTP. (If error 534 occurs during connection, the server does not support secure mode, so do not select this option)
ftpClient.baseUrl.description: Base URL. (Used to preview file URLs in the browser, e.g., http://test.com/)
ftpClient.ignore: Ignore files. (Regular expressions used to ignore files or directories during upload)
ftpClient.defaultUri: Default path. (The default path opened when selecting a folder. If not configured, the current workspace directory is used by default)
ftpClient.confirmTheUploadDirectory: Upload path confirmation. (If this option is checked, an input box will appear showing the upload path after selecting a folder or file for upload. The path can be modified, and pressing Enter will confirm the upload)
ftpClient.previewAfterUploading: Preview after uploading. (If this option is checked and a base URL is configured, the browser will automatically open to preview the file after the upload is complete)
title: FTP
ftpExplorer.setRootDirectory: Set Current Path as Root Directory
svgPreview.title: SVG Preview
videoPreview.title: Video Preview
videoPreview.error: Your browser does not support the video tag.
imagePreview.title: Image Preview

ftp.path.invalid: Invalid path: expected a string but got {0}

ftp.provider.enterDestinationPath: Enter the destination path on the FTP server

ftp.provider.invalidDefaultUriFormat: The configured defaultUri {0} is not a valid path. Falling back to workspaceFolder.
